channel.title: Peers Conf 2018
channel.description: Both @ian and I will be speaking at [Peers Conf in Austin TX](http://peersconf.com/2018) next month. Those of you who listen to the show know that we've both been there a few times and consider it to be a great event for bootstrappers. If you're going to be there, come up and say "hi". I'd love to meet some folks from the forums in real life.

item.title: Peers Conf 2018
item.dc:creator: andrey
item.description:
Both @ian and I will be speaking at Peers Conf in Austin TX next month. Those of you who listen to the show know that we’ve both been there a few times and consider it to be a great event for bootstrappers. If you’re going to be there, come up and say “hi”. I’d love to meet some folks from the forums in real life.
